Title: Kaishain! Nourin Suisan-shou e Iku
Description: ['A collaboration between ', Asa da yo! Kaishain, ' and ', Japanese Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry, and Fisheries, ' (MAFF); specifically the Fisheries department. As the Kaishain cast get lost in MAFF and learn about the work culture and business done at the ministry. This is in part to promote new job openings there.']
Related: ['Character: Kamiusagi Rope: Warau Asa ni wa Fukuraitaru tte Maji ssuka!?']
